Name: Yeti Shopping Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Kidult Shopping mount that can double-jump and travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Kidult Shopping mount that can double-jump and travel very fast. Double-click a location on the World Map and you will automatically fly to the destination following the navigation line. (Auto flight is only available on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Riding Authorization Continents by purchasing Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Kidult Shopping mount that can double-jump and travel very fast.
